Name: 18th Century
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare lime slice wheel (ideally dehydrated) for garnish.
Review: Sweet 'n' sour with the unmistakable funky twang of Batavia arrack .
History: A riff on the classic 20th Century Cocktail , created in 2008 by Phil Ward at Death & Co. , New York City, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of 18th Century contains 235 calories
